__inputs.name: DS_TELEGRAF
__inputs.label: Telegraf
__inputs.description: Data Source for SNMP and compute metrics

panels.content:
<style type="text/css">
p.markdown-html.panel-text-content {
overflow: hidden;
}
p.markdown-html.panel-text-content iframe {
height:225px;
}
</style>
<script type="text/javascript">
var weatherProperties = 'lat=28.3852&lon=-81.5639&color=#FFFFFF&text-color=#FFFFFF';
 
// initial load
document.getElementById('embedweather').src = 'http://forecast.io/embed/?ts=' + (Date.now()) + '#' + weatherProperties;
 
// refresh
var weatherRefresh = setInterval(function() { document.getElementById('embedweather').src = 'http://forecast.io/embed/?ts=' + (Date.now()) + '#' + weatherProperties; }, 1800000);
 
</script>
<iframe id="embedweather" height="100%" src="#" style="margin: 0; padding: 0; border: none; width:100%; position:relative; top:-50px; overflow:hidden; margin-bottom: -70px;"></iframe>

targets.query: SELECT hrStorageUsed * hrStorageAllocationUnits / 1024  FROM syno_volume WHERE (agent_host = '10.10.10.10' AND "hrStorageDescr" = '/volume1')
SELECT hrStorageUsed * hrStorageAllocationUnits / 1024  FROM syno_volume WHERE (agent_host = '10.10.10.10' AND "hrStorageDescr" = '/volume2')
SELECT hrStorageUsed * hrStorageAllocationUnits / 1024  FROM syno_volume WHERE (agent_host = '10.10.10.10' AND "hrStorageDescr" = '/volume3')
SELECT hrStorageUsed * hrStorageAllocationUnits / 1024  FROM syno_volume WHERE (agent_host = '10.10.10.10' AND "hrStorageDescr" = '/volume1')
SELECT hrStorageUsed * hrStorageAllocationUnits / 1024  FROM syno_volume WHERE (agent_host = '10.10.10.10' AND "hrStorageDescr" = '/volume1')

panels.content: <iframe height="100%" src="https://www.actiontiles.com" style="margin: 0; padding: 0; border: none; width:100%; position:relative; top:0; overflow:hidden; margin-bottom:0;"></iframe>
panels.title: Home sensors

targets.query: SELECT last("usage_idle") *-1+100 FROM "cpu" WHERE ("host" = 'usheildrone02' AND "cpu" = 'cpu-total') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

title: Stats at a Glance for Home Infrastructure
description: Weather - Ubiquiti Unifi Router - Synology NAS - Pi-Hole - ActionTiles for Smartthings - Plex / Tautulli
